entry.title: Review of 2025 & Hopes for 2026
entry.summary: Improvements: English communication skills Key Lessons Learned: Life is short and People will die Be kind to the people around you Think more when make a big decision, the more important, the more thinking Face death to live Be relax, everything will be okay Hopes for 2026: Travel with my families once Be kind to yourself Cherish high-quality companionship with my fa...

entry.title: Warning List
entry.summary: Principles and disciplines Take more time for huge decision, the more impact the more time spent on it. Job decision must take 2 ~ 3 months to think! Impact more than 50 thousands cost, must have at least 2 weeks to thinking! Impact more than 10 thousands cost, must have at least 1 week to thinking! Take a decision tree, list the cons and pros first, and considering for a while, no rush to...

entry.title: Stop Doing List
entry.summary: Rush to make a decision Over thinking Look back too ofen and can not move forward Hurt family members Hurt team members Try to fix the past

entry.title: What is AI
entry.summary: Artificial intelligence (AI), in its broadest sense, is intelligence exhibited by machines, particularly computer systems. It is a field of research in computer science that develops and studies methods and software that enable machines to perceive their environment and use learning and intelligence to take actions that maximize their chances of achieving defined goals. Such machines may be cal...
